import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { AccountContext } from "../Context/AccountProvider"; function AccountLikesItem({ product, size, itemId }) { const { DeleteItemChange, AddTopDelBottom } = useContext(AccountContext) const ProductToBasket = { product_id: product.id, size: size, amount: 1, } const DeleteProduct = { likes_id: itemId } return (

  • {product.product_name}

      Цвет: {product.color}

      Цена: {product.price}$

      Pазмер:

    • ) } export default AccountLikesItem
